title: Makes various changes concerning the abatement or deferment of certain taxes imposed on a new or expanded business. (BDR 32-9)
Adopts the Rules of the Assembly for the 27th Special Session of the Nevada Legislature. (BDR R-3)
Provides for the appointment of attaches. (BDR R-5)
Provides that no allowances will be paid for the 27th Special Session of the Nevada Legislature for periodicals, stamps, stationery or communications. (BDR R-7)
Adopts the Joint Rules of the Senate and Assembly for the 27th Special Session of the Legislature. (BDR R-1)
Makes various changes relating to the Clark County Sales and Use Tax Act of 2005. (BDR S-10)
Makes an appropriation to the Millennium Scholarship Trust Fund. (BDR S-12)
Revises provisions relating to the Account for Charter Schools. (BDR 34-13)
Adopts the Rules of the Senate for the 27th Special Session of the Legislature. (BDR R-2)
Provides that no allowances will be paid for the 27th Special Session of the Nevada Legislature for periodicals, stamps, stationery or communications. (BDR R-6)
Provides for the appointment of Senate staff. (BDR R-4)
